title: Bachelor of Computer & Electrical Engineering, Bachelor of IT
description: I'm studying a dual bachelor with a current GPA of 6.9. I have received the dean's commendation each semester, and have been awarded 8 scholarships.

title: UQ Teaching Assistant
description: I have taught classes up up to 90 students on topics including embedded systems, web design, networking, and operating systems. Responsibilities also include grading course assessment.

title: UQ Summer Research Project
description: I was awarded a research scholarship with UQ to design and prototype technology to improve the lives of people with dementia.
